text: Hello therehow are you?
I am good. How are you?
I'm pretty good, just trying to get ready for work soon.
I understand that.  So tell me about this charity.
Have you heard of Save the Children?  They do work around health, education, etc.
I'm not sure that I have.
They work mostly in developing countries.  I would appreciate it if some of the funds could be donated.  The researchers will pass that donation on to the charity at the end.
What kind of work do they do?
They do emergency hunger relief, are engaged with Syrian children.
Ok, that sounds good.  How do I know it is a legitimate charity?
you can check their website  URL   They are highly rated by Charity Watch.
That's good to know.  How long have they been around?
Almost 100 years!
That's pretty impressive.
Do you think you would be willing to donate a portion of your earnings?
I just can't see doing that.
Why do you think that?  There are children dying in Syria who can benefit from the donation.
I understand that.  But, I choose my own charities independently.
ok, I understand that.  i hope you have a good day
Ok, you too!
